title: CTA CHEST ABDOMEN PELVIS WITH CONTRAST

technique.description: CT angiogram images of the chest, abdomen and pelvis with XX ml XX intravenous contrast.

findings.aorta: No thoracic aortic aneurysm, dissection, or intramural hematoma. Normal abdominal aortic diameter (<3cm).
findings.abdomen: Evaluation of the abdominal organs is limited due to arterial phase of contrast enhancement.
findings.gallbladder: No calcified gallstones. No significant biliary dilation.
findings.peritoneum: No significant free fluid. No free air.

impression: Normal CTA chest, abdomen and pelvis.
